Cities.Historical_Landmarks: St. Michael's Church with carved wooden columns, the modern-style Presidential Palace.
Cities.Tourist_Activities: Strolling along the Pacific Ocean promenade, visiting the Gabonese Arts and Traditions Museum, shopping at the bustling Mont Bouet market.
Cities.Local_Cuisine: Nyimboy (chicken in palm sauce) with cooked plantains, fresh grilled fish on the beach.
Cities.Green_Spaces: The small Bonsuang Park within the city, the city's secluded beaches.

Cities.Historical_Landmarks: St. Louis Cathedral, the colonial town center.
Cities.Tourist_Activities: Enjoying Lomingui Beach, dolphin‑watching tours, Atlantic Ocean fishing.
Cities.Local_Cuisine: Fresh oysters and spiced crab, fried cassava pastries.
Cities.Green_Spaces: Mangrove forests around the town, Oguwe Bay.

Cities.Historical_Landmarks: Old government buildings, the local central market.
Cities.Tourist_Activities: Visiting the Omar Bongo statue, exploring the hills of Oguwe Hollywood, hiking forest trails.
Cities.Local_Cuisine: Smoked meats (especially venison) with pumpkin seed sauce.
Cities.Green_Spaces: Munda Park with open views, surrounding green hills.

Cities.Historical_Landmarks: Traditional small churches, rural wooden houses.
Cities.Tourist_Activities: Experiencing local Fang culture, visiting the fresh produce market.
Cities.Local_Cuisine: Cooked peanut beans with rice, sweet grilled plantains.
Cities.Green_Spaces: Forested areas near the Cameroon and Equatorial Guinea borders.

Cities.Historical_Landmarks: Albert Schweitzer Hospital (important historic medical site), riverside houses.
Cities.Tourist_Activities: Historical tour of Albert Schweitzer Hospital, boat trips on Oguwe Lake.
Cities.Local_Cuisine: Tilapia from the river, vegetarian Odiaka stew.
Cities.Green_Spaces: Interconnected lake system around the town, the hospital botanical garden.

Cities.Tourist_Activities: Visiting the manganese mine complex, exploring surrounding hills and villages.
Cities.Local_Cuisine: African vegetable stew with chicken, boiled cassava.

Cities.Tourist_Activities: Visiting Ipbinda caves, hiking in the savanna.
Starting point for Ivindo National Park, river boat trips.
Cities.Local_Cuisine: Seasoned river fish, fresh forest fruits.

Cities.Tourist_Activities: Visiting nearby Bundolo waterfalls, hiking mountain forests.
Cities.Local_Cuisine: Kibondo (meat and bean dish), vegetable rice.

Cities.Tourist_Activities: Ecotourism to see elephants on the beach, relaxing on quiet shores.
Cities.Local_Cuisine: Grilled seafood, chicken baked in sand.
Cities.Green_Spaces: Lwango National Park (very close), Gamba Lake.

Cities.Historical_Landmarks: Rova Palace (royal palace complex), Avenue de l'Indépendance.
Cities.Tourist_Activities: Exploring the Queen's Palace (Rova), visiting the Zoma market, strolling around Anosi Lake.
Cities.Local_Cuisine: Romazava (meat and vegetable stew in broth), Ravitoto (cassava leaf stew with meat).
Cities.Green_Spaces: Lemur Park a short distance away, Tsimbazaza Park.

Cities.Historical_Landmarks: Mount Pasoo Be (highest point), De Sascale lighthouse.
Cities.Tourist_Activities: Snorkeling and diving in the Mitsio archipelago, fishing in the Indian Ocean, visiting Amatot beach.
Cities.Local_Cuisine: Seafood curry with coconut, fresh pineapple.

Cities.Historical_Landmarks: Notre Dame de la Salette Cathedral, colonial train station.
Cities.Tourist_Activities: Riding traditional "pousse-pousse" rickshaws, visiting volcanic lakes (Lac Ranomafana), handicraft workshops.
Cities.Local_Cuisine: Koba (rice and peanut sweet), banana cake.

Cities.Tourist_Activities: Visiting the Baobab Avenue at sunset, relaxing on Baobab Beach.
Cities.Local_Cuisine: Famous Morondava shrimp dish, Sarimelona (cooked meat).

Cities.Tourist_Activities: Visiting the Alofiera nursery, exploring coral reefs in Saint Augustine Bay.
Cities.Local_Cuisine: Dried fish with rice, fish soup.

Cities.Tourist_Activities: Train ride through the rainforests, visiting southern vineyards.
Enjoying Amborovy beaches, visiting the giant baobab tree in the city center.
Visiting Diego bays, enjoying the beauty of Raminia beach.
Cities.Local_Cuisine: Large grilled shrimp, coconut fish soup.
Cities.Green_Spaces: The three Diego Suarez bays, Sugar Mountain.

Cities.Tourist_Activities: Whale watching (July‑September), diving on pirate ship wrecks.
Cities.Local_Cuisine: Fish with vanilla sauce, fresh lychee fruit.

Cities.Tourist_Activities: Surfing nearby beaches, visiting Lake Lanano.

Cities.Historical_Landmarks: Jemaa el‑Fna square, Bahia Palace, Ben Youssef Madrasa.
Cities.Tourist_Activities: Wandering Jemaa el‑Fna at night, visiting Majorelle Garden, bargaining in the old medina markets.
Cities.Local_Cuisine: Marrakech-style tangia baked in a traditional oven, vegetable and lamb tagine.
Cities.Green_Spaces: Majorelle Gardens (the blue garden), the Menara Gardens, olive orchard.

Cities.Historical_Landmarks: Hassan II Mosque (tallest minaret in the world), Cathedral of the Sacred Heart.
Cities.Tourist_Activities: Visiting Hassan II Mosque (city icon), strolling the Ain Diab Corniche, exploring the Habous district.
Cities.Local_Cuisine: Traditional Moroccan couscous, seafood dishes on the corniche.

Cities.Historical_Landmarks: Square of Ouata al‑Hammam, the Kasbah (old fortress).

Cities.Tourist_Activities: Visiting the Cave of Hercules, watching the meeting of the Mediterranean and Atlantic at Cape Spartel, walking through the Kasbah.

Cities.Tourist_Activities: Enjoying Agadir's long beach, visiting Kasbah Oufla, shopping at the Sunday market.
Cities.Local_Cuisine: Fresh grilled fish dishes, amlou (almond‑honey‑argan paste).

Cities.Tourist_Activities: Walking the old town and port, watching sunset from the ramparts, surfing.

Cities.Historical_Landmarks: Bab Mansour (massive gate), Mausoleum of Moulay Ismail.

Cities.Historical_Landmarks: Christ the Redeemer statue, Sugarloaf Mountain, Lapa neighborhood (colonial architecture).

Cities.Historical_Landmarks: Itaipu Hydroelectric Dam (one of the largest dams).

Cities.Tourist_Activities: Visiting the futuristic Brasília Cathedral, strolling the Three Powers Square, visiting the Juscelino Kubitschek Bridge.

Cities.Historical_Landmarks: Historic Olinda town near Recife, Freddie Bessa Cultural Center.
